briefdescription.para: This module contains "Main" routine and the APIs , in which user can easily integrate application specific routines.
Global instance that is used by NVM to maintain internal (secured) data.

detaileddescription.para: Global instance for NMV section that is placed in user data flash. Usually the application has to create an instance of this structure. It may then be used by other modules to access the user data section

briefdescription.para: Data buffer of the user data NVM section.

detaileddescription.para: This buffer is used by the NVM module to access and write the non volatile memory (NVM) section in the user data page of the internal flash.

memberdef.argsstring: (const unsigned long line, const unsigned char *const file)
memberdef.name: assertIndicationMapping

briefdescription.para: This API is called when function enters an assert.

parameterdescription.para: :currently unused, can be used for future implementation.

briefdescription.para: The main function initializes the hardware and starts the RTOS scheduler.

This function is SysTick Handler. This is called when ever the IRQ is hit. This is a temporary implementation where the SysTick_Handler() is not directly mapped to xPortSysTickHandler(). Instead it is only called if the scheduler has started.
This function is called when is stack overflows and the program gets into infinite loop.
